datastructures.math

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • datastructures.math.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    Matrix of ints represented internally by two-dimensional array

    • Constructor Detail

      • Matrix

        public Matrix(int[][] array)
        Parameters:
        array - the array on which the matrix should be based on, must not be null and must be rectangular

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public Matrix clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a clone of the matrix which can be edited without editing the original matrix

      • getAsArray

        public int[][] getAsArray()
        Returns:
        an independent array which is represented by the matrix

      • isValidMatrix

        public static boolean isValidMatrix(int[][] array)
        Parameters:
        array - which should be checked, must not be null
        Returns:
        if the given array is rectangular

      • getMatrixDimensions

        public Tuple<java.lang.Integer> getMatrixDimensions()
        Returns:
        a Tuple in which Tuple.getA() represents the height of the matrix Tuple.getB() its width

      • getValueAtCoordinates

        public int getValueAtCoordinates(Tuple<java.lang.Integer> coordinates)
        Parameters:
        coordinates - a Tuple which represents the coordinates, in which Tuple.getA() is the vertical index and Tuple.getB() the horizontal (both start at 0)
        Returns:
        the value of the matrix at the specified coordinates

      • add

        public void add(Matrix matrix)
        Parameters:
        matrix - which should be added to this matrix, must have the same dimensions

      • transpose

        public void transpose()
        Transposes the matrix

      • multiply

        public void multiply(Matrix matrix)
        Parameters:
        matrix - which should be multiplied to this matrix. The width of the base-matrix has to match the height of the matrix specified in this parameter

      • multiply

        public void multiply(int scalar)
        Parameters:
        scalar - which the matrix should be scaled with
